attributes.action: Classify the media as 'public authorities' for the purposes of Section 8 of the Human RIghts Act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently the media use covert surveillance, under cover reporters, phone taps, database invasions and other unsavoury methods without any control.

Classifying them in this way would prevent them using these methods to report on the legal activities of private individuals and require them when reporting on illegal activities to comply with the requirements of RIPA as to producing written justification approved by senior managers and subject to inspection by the surveillance commissioner.
